lead_paragraph: A small but vocal number of law enforcement officials are calling for a rethinking of axioms that have emphasized how to use force, not how to avoid it.

headline.print_headline: Police Rethink Long Tradition on Using Force
headline.main: Police Rethink Long Tradition on Using Force

snippet: A small but vocal number of law enforcement officials are calling for a rethinking of axioms that have emphasized how to use force, not how to avoid it.
abstract: Some law enforcement officials are calling for reexamination of policies governing use of force, including longstanding 21-foot rule, in midst of debate over several controversial police shootings; reform-minded officers are calling for increased training in de-escalation, but majority have expressed skepticism and complain that police are being blamed unfairly.
